alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Morrow County through 430 PM PDT... At 400 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lexington, or 8 miles north of Heppner, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
